FAQ

How fresh is the data?

We pull from official LADBS sources and refresh continuously. Each record includes its latest update time.

Can I filter by contractor or neighborhood?

Yes—use keyword filters in the CSV or include the area/contractor name when creating an alert.

Do you support CSV exports and email alerts?

Yes—download CSVs for analysis and create alerts to get new matches by email.
